flawed_nl_solution:
The rate of the loan is 15%, which means Mike needs to give the bank an additional 20000 * 15/100 = $<<20000*15/100=30000>>30000.
So the car will cost him 35000 + 30000 = $<<35000+30000=65000>>65000.
#### 65000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
